charges.charge_description: 21:846.C1.F Conspired With Others Knowingly And Intentionally to Possess With Intent to Distribute And to Distribute Controlled Substance, Namely, 5 Kilograms or More of Mixtures Containing Cocaine And One Kilgram or More of Mixtures Containing Heroin
Knowingly And Intentionally to Distribute And to Possess With Intent to Distribute A Controlled Substance, Namely, Five Kilograms or More of Mixtures Containing Cocaine (1)
Controlled Substance - Sell, Distribute, OR Dispense 18:2 Aiding (2)
Knowingly And Intentionally Possessed With Intent to Distribute A Controlled Substance, Namely, One Kilogram or More of Mixtures Containing Heroin, A Schedule I Narcotic Drug Controlled Substance (3)

21:846.C1.F Conspired With Others Knowingly And Intentionally to Possess With Intent to Distribute And to Distribute Controlled Substance, Namely, 5 Kilograms or More of Mixtures Containing Cocaine And One Kilgram or More of Mixtures Containing Heroin
Knowingly And Intentionally to Distribute And to Possess With Intent to Distribute A Controlled Substance, Namely, Five Kilograms or More of Mixtures Containing Cocaine (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Total Term Of: One-Hundred-Eighty (188) Months as to Count One. Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of : 5 Years as to Count One. Standard Conditions of Supervision. Criminal Monetary Penalties. Schedule of Payments.

charges.charge_disposition: Count(S) 2 &; 3 Are Dismissed on Motion of The United States.
